attributes.action: Recommend Nigel Mansell for a Knighthood at the earliest opportunity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nigel Mansell, F1 World Champion and Indy Car Champion in successive years after a career of championing all things good about Britain, determination, spirit and sportsmanship! With so many sports people getting accolades for lesser achievements, surely a Knighthood is reward for decades of sporting achievement, charity work and being role model for individuals.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
